Text: This is my first torrent ever. Hope I handled this correctly. I uploaded the torrent file, which I assume points to the location on my hard drive. If that's not how it works, let me know.
You're welcome. Didn't think anyone was ever going to download this! I don't remember what version number it is.
thanks. hope somebody's still seeding this
Great upload. Love small word processors.
thank you very much just what i need to start drafting my book
Thank u , I just discovered this lovely prog. when ,I was using MultiBoot cd ( very useful tool for each one having Pc ) , I hope someone is still seeding , bu thx any way

I love small word processors too, but this one managed to completely obliterate my 200-page personal journal after opening it once...second time it opened as just a blank page, even though it still worked fine in Open Office. Maybe that's some kind of 'feature' I didn't find...but already has alarm bells ringing...back to (free) OO! No, I didn't lose any data btw.
